title: Pearington 24 Device Mobile Charging and Storage Cart for iPads, Chromebooks and Laptop Computers, Up to 15-Inch Screen Size, Surge Protection, Front & Back Access Locking Cabinet
features: CHARGE & STORE 24 DEVICES AT ONCE: Store and charge 24 devices at one time, in a secure, space-saving, versatile, mobile cart
UP TO 15‚Äù SCREEN SIZE: Large sized, padded slots provide ample storage and protection for iPads, Chromebooks and Laptops
ROLLING CART: Even fully loaded this cart is quickly and easily transported from classroom to office with a robust handle for easy pushing or pulling and 4 caster wheels

SAFE and SECURE STORAGE: Protect your devices with padded bays to deter damage, ventilated panels to prevent overheating, surge protectors to protect from power fluctuations and a key locking system for the front & back doors, in addition to 2 locking caster wheels to keep cart in place
MULTI-USE: Ideal for K-12 schools, universities, offices, nursing homes, hospitals, airports and more, assembly required
EASY ACCESS: Front and back doors open fully for easy access to computers and charging cables
BONUS FEATURE: Bottom shelf for additional storage
description: The Pearington 24 Bay rolling, charging cart station is compatible to use for tablets, chrome books, iPads and laptops. This is the perfect tool for schools, colleges, offices, nursing homes and libraries. This mobile charging cart is a secure way to transport your products from room to room and keep them secure. The key locking system for the front & back doors maintain the extra security for your electronics. The inside features padded bays for device protection & an upper shelf for extra storage. The charging cart is constructed of a durable steel frame with ventilation in order to keep the electronics from overheating. The Pearington charging cart can store up to 24 tablets or laptops that are up to 15 inches in size. Some assembly is required. Cart measures 40"h, 31"w, 21".
